nodes.text: Soun IV was an astronomical object located in the Soun system, a part of the Outer Expansion Zone sub-region and the freestanding subsectors portion of the Expansion Region. In 22 BBY, a princess from Soun IV visited the Outlander Club on the Core Worlds planet Coruscant. By 12 ABY, the Soun system fell within the borders of the New Republic.

Soun IV was introduced in the 2003 reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Attack of the Clones, authored by Simon Beecroft. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Soun system, and therefore Soun IV, in grid square J-8.

The StarWars.com Online Companion to The Essential Atlas further placed the Soun system in the Mondress sector, however, this was contradicted by both the Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region, a 2012 feature of the Online Companion, and the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, both of which placed the system in the freestanding subsectors area of the Expansion Region, outside the Mondress sector. This article assumes the latter placement of the Soun system is correct.
